name: Solar Edge (Pixcom studio)
description:
Escape the loop! Literally... You're on your mission to save your colony by escaping from the orbit of a solar system with rapidly expanding sun. But there's a catch...

This game was made in 48 hours all by me (including art, music, code...) for Ludum Dare 47 (#LDJAM).

This game was programmed on Linux, thus it runs and looks the best on it, but you can easily run it on windows, you just need to have latest Java.

And if you want to rate this game directly on Ludum Dare you can here - https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/solar-edge
